price: Ìjọ tí ó pe àwọn āyah Wa nírọ́, wọ́n burú ní àfiwé. Ara wọn sì ni wọ́n ń ṣàbòsí sí.
arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: sāa mathalan al-qawmu alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā wa-anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūna
